name: audiobookrequest
description: AudioBookRequest is a self-hosted system to manage audiobook requests for media servers. It allows users to request titles and admins to track library additions for services like Jellyfin.
features: Request Management: Users can request audiobooks for your library. Community-driven.
Admin Tracking: Monitor and fulfill audiobook requests. Organized workflow.
Media Server Integration: Works with Jellyfin and similar platforms. Seamless integration.
Request Queue: Prioritize and manage incoming requests. Efficient processing.
User Interface: Simple request submission for library users. Easy participation.
Library Management: Track additions to your audiobook collection. Complete catalog.
Self-Hosted: Run your own request system. Complete control.
Notification System: Alert users when requests are fulfilled. Keep users informed.
